entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
